attributes.action: Create a day for bog standard blokes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we now have Mother's day, Father's day, Grandparent's day etc its now time to create a day for bog standard blokes without families.  On this day bog standard blokes will recieve a block of chocolate, a four pack of beer/lager, a DVD and a Sunday afternoon at home to enjoy them.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
